nodes.text: The Armorer's workshop was a workshop used by the Armorer around 9 ABY within the Mandalorian covert on the Outer Rim planet Nevarro. Using the cryo-furnace and her many tools within the workshop, the Armorer constructed Mandalorian armor and weaponry.

Some time later, what remained of the workshop was taken over by Aqualish thieves. The thieves were promptly vanquished when they were attacked by Cara Dune, the acting marshal of Nevarro, leaving the workshop vacant once more.
